quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. Your first objective is to go north. And then, go north. After that, travel west. If you can manage that, make an attempt to go south. Then, try to travel south. Next, attempt to venture south. Then, attempt to move south. With that accomplished, recover the lavender scented passkey from the floor of the playroom. After stealing the lavender scented passkey, make an effort to venture east. Once you get through with that, unlock the lavender scented chest with the lavender scented passkey. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: unlock lavender scented chest with lavender scented passkey
unlock lavender scented chest with lavender scented passkey

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You've entered a garage. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 [if c_0 is locked]A locked[else if c_0 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] lavender scented chest is in the room.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The lavender scented chest contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The lavender scented chest is empty![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a playroom. Let's see what's in here.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You are in a canteen. A normal kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You can make out a platter. The platter is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the platter you see [a list of things on the s_0]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the platter! oh well.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You're now in a shower. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a washroom like it isn't some huge deal. The room is well lit.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedroom. A typical one.

 You see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] normal looking non-euclidean box right there by you.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The non-euclidean box contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The non-euclidean box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a basket.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

You're now in the basement. You start to take note of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

 You see a type 1 safe.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The type 1 safe contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

walkthrough: unlock lavender scented chest with lavender scented passkey

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First of all, take a trip north. And then, take a trip north. And then, take a trip west. Then, make an attempt to go south. After that, take a trip south. Once you finish that, take a trip south. Then, attempt to take a trip south. That done, lift the lavender scented passkey from the floor of the playroom. And then, head east. Okay, and then, make absolutely sure that the lavender scented chest within the garage is unlocked with the lavender scented passkey. Got that? Good!
